comments.body:
I think they could, if they have utility, that is help the player in reducing grind or in a function that helps them in general gameplay.

For example, a "guard" golem that patrols along light routes at light level 1 or 2 and "alarms" at hostile mobs (maybe attack), you could add in the copper golems oxidation maintenance for balance. If you put a lead on the golem it will follow you into a dark place, however, it won't alarm unless in a lite area. This gives you a mining buddy or a feature to have a "guard" at villages can could then be drawn in the Iron Golems. This is a tweak of the Glare which was almost right in utility, finding dark spots is handy, but having a mob that seeks them out to pout is annoying, one that partols in the light limit though, and growls at danger an improvement.

Any Golem that could reduce the grind of farming, lumber, fishing, heck actual sorting, but take "nap breaks" like the tuff golem, would also have a strong chance to win, without replacing the function of the Iron or Snow golems (which honest the snow needs some upgrades). And honestly is a way to address the common mod and data pack QoL patching. The mechanics for Copper and Tuff mainanece were awsome what they did not so much.

Golems are constructs designed to make a player's life easier, the most a player could have used the copper or tuff golem for (besides decor) would be a redstone randomizer, which doesn't play to the larger community.
I want the copper golem pls add that mob

Also, if you reach the 3rd level (the jungle one) enemies don't spawn. You're kind of softlocked on mobile.
*Bug* When 2 players access the upgrade mirror in Spellcraft at the same time, now it shows "Currently in-use" for both players and cannot access upgrade mirror.
I think a lot about mobile doesn't work. On top of these issues, I couldn't fly on mobile. Worked fine holding jump on Windows 10.
I also am unable to use runes on mobile

(I hope this is the right place, please redirect if possible) I've been playing spellcraft for a minute now on ps4 and have experienced a multitude of issues, mainly problems with poor fps further into the game (mostly likely due to particles and other effects) but for the most part has been bearable, however, one of the biggest issues I have had is going into my spellcraft world to find that it has disabled my lightning spell. The spell is one I had primarily used through my entire playthrough up to this point, and I had atleast 5 level 3 upgrades on. Hovering over the item space in my inventory it read that my spell was in the alter when it wasn't there, and making it presumably unretrievable.
Please fix the bug with runes on the mobile.runes cannot be used.
I can't use the runes everything else works fine on my phone unlike other people saying the flying or enemies not spawning but the runes imprinter doesn't let me place the rune

Spellcraft realm world does not save progress, every new entry on a different day results in having to start over from the very beginning. It's not fun having to start all over again every single time our family wants to play.
What I found that doesn‚Äôt work is flying/floating and the runes in the rift.

I normally wouldn't leave feedback on games. But this really bothered me. Got to rift 36, died, and came out all normally except everything is a bit laggy. Sold all my materials for about 119,000. Because it was still laggy, I saved and quit, and restarted the game.

After getting back in, got a major rollback. Had 4 rune pillers but now back to three. The 4 runes previously put on fire and green stayed on there. Former runes seems to be all there still. These were stored in the large chest (not the ender) by rune carver. Had a ton of mirror upgrades, now rolled back too. And of course, 119k gone, back down to once upon a time when I had 120. My portal record got rolled back to rift 15 or 16...

No idea if gamemode one would look at this, but I really hope so. For now, I'm rather dissuaded to proceed since it may rollback at random.
when I enter a map with a big pillar in the middle the mob can't spawn, so I'm stuck on that map, please fix it
And how does the existence of this help?
I love that! Yes please! This is one of the reasons why I don‚Äôt play minecraft offline

Yes!!! I live in a dorm room with really horrible wifi, it kicks me off often and the process to reconnect usually takes about 5 minutes, so I prefer to just play offline to avoid the hassle, but it leaves me with a basic Steve skin. I think it‚Äôs be nice to be able to download skins that you‚Äôve purchased/made onto the console for use when the game is offline!
Could the allay eat different flowers and make mixed-up colors?

This feels like it'd be the best way of going about this, and it's also simple enough to be useful to early game or redstone-unable players, without being so simple that you just slap it down anywhere. I think if allays are going to have favorite instruments, Mojang might wanna add a few more noteblock sounds too...

To add to this - I don't think Allays should favourite a noteblock for just 30 seconds. I think it should be indefinite - until the player breaks the Noteblock or the Allay hears a Noteblock with the same instrument and higher pitch and changes their favourite.

To unassign a Noteblock to an Allay without assigning a new one, the Allay should simply be interacted with - or to work with Redstone systems, ringing a Bell could unassign all nearby Allays from Noteblocks, dismissing them
Play a noteblock and give the item to the allay. It will remember that until you take back your item.
I guess now we know why they call it the light at the end of the tunnel

they do not "poop" it out, the light is created from the magma cube inside of the frogs throat pouch, which has expanded/stretched to cover the magma cube, much like a balloon.

Make it available for Xbox one s
The problem is for the windows 10 version they used a different processing program then on Xbox series x/s which are the only ray tracing compatible consoles currently

Just so everyone knows, older consoles such as Xbox One, PS4, and Nintendo Switch cannot run Ray-tracing due to the fact they do not have the hardware for it. (PC versions of minecraft already have working Ray-tracing for computers that have RTX 2000 series and above graphics cards.)

It's coming to Series S, X and the PS5 the Older Systems cannot run RT they are far too weak and Bedrock too unoptimised in the first place.

Agreed. Mob transparency in particular is unnatural when you consider how often you interact with mobs up close, like feeding, shearing, milking, etc. The same goes for glass. If the borders of the block are somehow too distracting, a better solution would be to make the borders connect to adjacent glass blocks rather than make the entire block vanish. It completely defeats the purpose of stained and tinted glass. Additionally, what about situations in which the player wants to obscure view? using stained/tinted glass and even plants like sugar cane or tall flowers are a fantastic way to affect depth, detail, and line of sight in builds, and this addition takes that creative freedom away from players for no apparent reason.

We need off hand.picaxe+stone and more combination. So, Mojang I request you to allow off hand in bedrock. Pls.üôèüôè
